title: Account Recovery Confusion
body:
I understand that the Riot support team must amount to one person feverishly trying to type on 7 computers (3 of which are on fire) due to worlds going on and the amount of things going on so I'm not upset about the response to tickets taking a long time, I understand that.

My confusion lies in that if someone had their account changed/hacked how would they be able to check on the status of their ticket if you require them to log in with the account they can't access to check the ticket.

replies.body:
For account recoveries, there isn't a way to check the status of your ticket, since you're unable to log into the Riot Support site. If you provide me with your ticket number, I can confirm whether it was sent to our system successfully, but I won't be able to provide estimated response times.

Let me know if you have any questions.
